name: Utils
tagline: Public utilities for solving "Permutations and Combinations" problems
body:
### Welcome to JP9's utilities page

These are a few simple utilities that I wrote while solving some puzzles. 

Repository URL: https://github.com/jp9/utils

### Utilities provided in the project
* Ability to find all the possible combinations of picking "r" items from a collection of size "n".
* Sorted array list implementation (See code for limitations). 

### Authors and Contributors
@jp9 (if you submit patches, your name will be added here)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
